    Codebird PHP Easily post to twitter from a program written in PHP with this helpful tool.Facebook API Explorer Test various API calls to Facebook and even generate authentication tokens.PHP Graph SDK Post to Facebook easily from your applications written in PHP.Twitter Developer Access tools to aid you in connecting programs to Twitter and register apps to communicate with Twitter.DataTables Use this jQuery Plugin to instantly add capabilities such as sorting, searching, and paging to your simple HTML tables.jQuery Use this JavaScript library to expand upon the basic capabilities of the language and easily create scripts compatible in multiple browsers.Ack Easily search for terms in your files from the command line with this tool.JPEXS Flash Decompiler Use this free tool to convert SWF files back into FLA format, so they can be easily edited.Sothink SWF Decompiler Use this paid decompiler to transform SWF files into FLA format.Adobe Animate Create dynamic games and animations for the web and other devices in this program that offers a free trial and education discount.OpenMPI Create programs that can be distributed on multiple computers making use of more processing power using this tool.CUDA Write parallel programs that use the many cores in your graphics card with this tool.Game Maker Easily make games that can be published on multiple platforms without any programming knowledge needed.
